title: Looking to Host a tournament
body: Im looking into hosting an officially sponsored riot Tournament, i will be putting some more work into this but i was hoping to host one over 3v3's and 5v5's and if i can have it officially sanctioned by riot that would be great. I will add Edits and progress on this post for updates etc. But i hope to host this with a Prize pool and if riot can sanction this event once it happens they can potentially earn themselves their triumphant skin. Location will be in Sydney CBD NSW. Anyone wishing to back me in this feel free to comment here on thoughts of schedules etc{{summoner:4}} .

replies.body:
